Platform Features

Advanced Security

Anti-cheat measures including fullscreen mode, tab switching detection, and single-device login restrictions ensure test integrity.

Multi-Level Testing

Three progressive difficulty levels with admin-controlled access, allowing structured learning paths and skill assessment.

Comprehensive Analytics

Detailed performance tracking, progress monitoring, and statistical analysis for both students and administrators.

Flexible Test Modes

Choose from questions 1-45, 46-90, or full practice tests to customize your learning experience.

User Management

Admin-controlled user creation, level access management, and device session monitoring for complete control.

Multi-Language Support

Available in English, Russian, and Uzbek languages to serve diverse user communities globally.
